ofcprobe.vswitch.trafficgen.arping

Class ARPManager

  • java.lang.Object
    • ofcprobe.vswitch.trafficgen.arping.ARPManager

  • public class ARPManager
extends java.lang.Object
    This Class is handling the generation of ARPs. Currently, every "HOST" generates an ARP-Request for every "HOST" in the Topology. Even for the ones on the same ofSwitch!
    Author:
    Christopher Metter(christopher.metter@informatik.uni-wuerzburg.de)

      • preGenerateArp

        private byte[] preGenerateArp()
        Pregenerates an ARP-Request Packet. So all Fields of the Packet that are always the same are set.
        Returns:
        a pregenarted ARP-Request
